table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));

table.name: vte_predictivefield
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_predictivefield` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `module` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `last_x_days` int(3) NOT NULL, `active` int(1) DEFAULT 1, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vte_predictivefield_predictions
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_predictivefield_predictions` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `predictivefield_id` int(10) NOT NULL, `field_name` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `field_label` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `field_type` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `prevalue` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `postvalue1` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `postvalue2` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `postvalue3` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `postvalue4` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `date_analyzed` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vte_predictivefield_predictions
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vte_predictivefield_predictions` ADD COLUMN `dont_show_if_older_than` int(10) NULL , ADD COLUMN `only_on_create` int(3) NULL , ADD COLUMN `only_if_blank` int(3) NULL ;
